data.title: Felicia Farr rides a bike.
data.meta_description:
Felicia Farr takes a spin around Jackson Hole, Wyoming, in 1955. The actress was in Big Sky country (look at those clouds!) shooting the CinemaScope western Jubal, described as "Othello on the range." Her costars: Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine and Rod Steiger. In the early Sixties, Farr met and married Jack Lemmon. 

Here's the verso for the Columbia Pictures photo taken by Van Pelt:

"GOING FARR?-- Lovely, shapely Felicia Farr, who plays one of femine leads opposite Glenn Ford in Columbia's Cinemascope-Technicolor film, 'Jubal,' gets ready for exercise spin on day off at Jackson Hole, Wyoming, where picture locationed."
data.text:
Felicia Farr takes a spin around Jackson Hole, Wyoming, in 1955. The actress was in Big Sky country (look at those clouds!) shooting the CinemaScope western Jubal, described as “Othello on the range.” Her costars: Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine and Rod Steiger. In the early Sixties, Farr met and married Jack Lemon.

Here’s the verso for the Columbia Pictures photo taken by Van Pelt:

“GOING FARR?– Lovely, shapely Felicia Farr, who plays one of femine leads opposite Glenn Ford in Columbia’s Cinemascope-Technicolor film, ‘Jubal,’ gets ready for exercise spin on day off at Jackson Hole, Wyoming, where picture locationed.”
